roleset.name: have, own
roleset.note: POSSESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'possess' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry (!!!!), Framenet entry Possession. (from possess.01-v predicate notes)
POSSESSION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb possess.01, VN class own-100. Framed by Claire. (from possession.01-n)

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: But Mr. Hahn rose swiftly through the ranks, demonstrating a raw intelligence that he says he knew he possessed *trace* early on.

example.name: prepositional variant
example.text: His answer is one-1 ``possessed *trace*-1 of a dignity in keeping with his position.''
example.arg: of a dignity in keeping with his position

example.name: not sure if this is the same roleset
example.text: John-1 is possessed *trace*-1 by evil spirits. Mostly tequila.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Iran , which was implicitly reminded not to interfere in the affairs of Iraq , was explicitly mentioned with the expression of Gulf concerns for its possession of nuclear programs .

example.name: Arg0 only, as question word
example.text: ...after the arrest of the first person in whose possession were ten pills of the same kind that were seized...

roleset.name: expressing the genitive. linguistics and grammar
roleset.note: POSSESSIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from possessive.02-j)

example.name: standard
example.text: In this verse the word Vishnur is in the partitive case whereas in others the case ending is possessive.

roleset.name: having ownership, perhaps stingily and greedily
roleset.note: POSSESSIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, possess.01, possession-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls own-100. (from possessive.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: He is very possesive and controlling but he has no right to be as we are not together .

example.name: The very dickens.
example.text: Laurie was possessive of her room as only an eleven-year-old girl can be, and she gave Brian the very dickens for coming in without knocking
example.arg: as only an eleven-year-old girl can be
